Effective Dates and Payment Dates for Veterans Pension
In general, the effective date for an original Veterans Pension claim is the date the claim was received, per
38 CFR 3.400
.  The payment date is the first day of the month following the date the claim was received, per
38 CFR 3.31
.

.
